body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Avenue. My name is Adam Bailey. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Adam, my name is Cheryl Parker.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello Cheryl. To assist you further, may I kindly ask for your email address and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is cherylparker@example.com and my phone number is five five five six eight nine one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Cheryl. I have noted your email as cherylparker@example.com and your phone number as five five five six eight nine one two.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Adam. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Cheryl. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us, Cheryl. Have a wonderful day!
